General.Name: Multibax Public Company Limited
General.Description: Multibax Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polymer bags in Thailand, North America, Australia, Europe, Asia, and other continents. It produces food packaging bags as well as various types of multi-purpose bags, garbage bags, bio-plastic bags, and polymer resin products. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
